name: Polechamps
description:
This is a game about climbing.

You will climb,

you will fall.

But you always get back up,

because a champ never quits.

And you are a champ. 

A pole champ.

Features
  • True climbing experience. Climb mountains with only a your wits, and a pole!
  • Play with your friends using local coop with up to 4 players!
  • Unbridled adventure.  A new mountain for every climb...
  • Poles. 
** This game currently only supports controllers. ** Controls
  • Analog Stick / Mouse to control pole.
  • X/A/Left Click to thrust pole.
